title: Adaptive Management System Design for Personalized Science Learning (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners engage in digital activities during offline classes using personal devices (BYOD), targeting intermediate expertise in science. Customized instructional design reflecting diverse learning paces and styles is required

learning_goals: Learners can identify individual learning patterns with ≥80% accuracy by analyzing scientific experiment data
Teachers can set ≥3-tier activity restrictions based on learner performance ranges (60-100 points) using Moodle plugins

The system analyzes weekly achievement test results (quiz accuracy ≥80%) of elementary and middle school students (teens), automatically generating and providing personalized learning paths (2 videos, 5 practice problems, 1 summary document) at three difficulty levels reflecting individual weak areas every two weeks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
